resources.string: Maniak is a book that definely will make you feel a lot. Most feelings are gonna be confused and bad, but you\'re still gonna love it!
Sancte Diaboli is a book that definely will make you feel a lot. Most feelings are gonna be confused and bad, but you\'re still gonna love it!
The Silver Swan is a book that definely will make you feel a lot. Most feelings are gonna be confused and bad, but you\'re still gonna love it!
